vocabinfos.mediumDef:
Combined with mig.dal (מִגְדָּל "Tower" H4026I)
§ This name is used for:
1) furnace, oven, fire-pot, (portable) stove
1a) for cooking
1b) of God's wrath, His furnace (fig)
1c) of hunger, desire for evil
1d) fire-pot
